gist.headline: Thumbnails that pop
gist.blurb: Gen Layers joins the creative showcase. Generate high-CTR YouTube thumbnails without the design headache.
gist.summary: Added Gen Layers, an AI tool for creating YouTube thumbnails, to the community apps list.
gist.impact: Creators can now easily discover and access Gen Layers for their video production workflows.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee as a digital artist working on a video thumbnail. Represents the new Gen Layers app for YouTube creators.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny artist beret, painting a colorful video thumbnail on a digital canvas. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft pastel gradient background. A retro monitor shows a play button. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi Stardew Valley vibes. Pixel text: 'CLICK ME'. Nostalgic and creative.
